title: How to Install 2002 2004 Acura RSX Aftermarket Headlights

steps.headline: Open the hood of your vehicle.
Locate and remove six plastic clips
From underneath the bumper, remove eight more plastic clips
Remove four screws from under the bumper as well
Remove hidden screw that connects the bumper to the fender with screwdriver.
Remove the bumper by gently rocking it from side to side.
Remove screws and bracket from headlight.
steps.description: You will use the bracket to attach the replacement.

steps.headline: Install bracket and sockets on new light.
Plug in all harnesses and connectors (including turn signal harness).
Follow steps 1 through 7 in reverse order.

text: Open the hood of your vehicle.  Locate and remove six plastic clips  From underneath the bumper, remove eight more plastic clips  Remove four screws from under the bumper as well  Remove hidden screw that connects the bumper to the fender with screwdriver.  Remove the bumper by gently rocking it from side to side.  Remove plastic shield.  Remove four screws from headlight.  Unplug corner signal light.  Remove screws and bracket from headlight. You will use the bracket to attach the replacement. Remove driving light and sockets.  Install bracket and sockets on new light.  Plug in all harnesses and connectors (including turn signal harness).  Replace headlight screws.  Follow steps 1 through 7 in reverse order.
sentences: Open the hood of your vehicle.

Locate and remove six plastic clips  From underneath the bumper, remove eight more plastic clips  Remove four screws from under the bumper as well  Remove hidden screw that connects the bumper to the fender with screwdriver.
Remove the bumper by gently rocking it from side to side.
Remove screws and bracket from headlight.
You will use the bracket to attach the replacement.
Install bracket and sockets on new light.
Plug in all harnesses and connectors (including turn signal harness).
Follow steps 1 through 7 in reverse order.
